actions.committee: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space and Technology.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Space.

official_title: To require the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, in meeting the needs of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for additional facilities, to select abandoned and underutilized facilities in depressed communities.
short_title: National Aeronautics and Space Administration Decentralization Act of 1993

summary.text: National Aeronautics and Space Administration Decentralization Act of 1993 - Directs the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to use abandoned and underutilized facilities in depressed communities to meet the Administration's facilities' needs.

titles.title: National Aeronautics and Space Administration Decentralization Act of 1993

To require the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, in meeting the needs of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for additional facilities, to select abandoned and underutilized facilities in depressed communities.
